meanings.definition: The female reproductive organ of a flower, consisting of an ovary, style, and stigma.
meanings.sent1: The carpels of the flower hold the seeds.
meanings.sent2: Bees help in pollinating the carpels of the flowers.
meanings.sent3: The carpels of the flower were gossiping about the bees.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness bloomed like the carpels of a flower.
meanings.sent5: The delicate carpels danced in the gentle breeze.

meanings.definition: A simple pistil, or one of the parts of a compound pistil, consisting of one or more united carpels.
meanings.sent1: Each carpel contributes to the formation of the fruit.
meanings.sent2: The carpels of the compound pistil were beautifully arranged.
meanings.sent3: The carpels decided to have a party to celebrate their unity.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was as strong as the united carpels in a flower.
meanings.sent5: The carpels worked together harmoniously to create new life.
